// Change Request Types
export let ChangeRequestType=/*#__PURE__*/function(ChangeRequestType){ChangeRequestType["SCHEDULE"]="SCHEDULE";ChangeRequestType["SCOPE"]="SCOPE";ChangeRequestType["BUDGET"]="BUDGET";ChangeRequestType["RESOURCE"]="RESOURCE";ChangeRequestType["CLOSURE"]="CLOSURE";ChangeRequestType["OTHER"]="OTHER";return ChangeRequestType;}({});export let ChangeRequestStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(ChangeRequestStatus){ChangeRequestStatus["PENDING"]="PENDING";ChangeRequestStatus["APPROVED"]="APPROVED";ChangeRequestStatus["REJECTED"]="REJECTED";ChangeRequestStatus["WITHDRAWN"]="WITHDRAWN";return ChangeRequestStatus;}({});// Additional interfaces for change request related functionality
